name: Trump and Pablo Go To White Castle
name_original: Trump and Pablo Go To White Castle
description:
Ride your bicycle, Mr. Cycles, through town on a race against time to get to White Castle before it closes. Use the Taco Cannon to shoot down enemies that try to get in the way. 

TRIGGER WARNING: Game features Trump, game features a Latino with a Taco Cannon, game features Nazi cacti as enemies.

WASD to move, space to jump, left click to shoot. Game was built in Unity 2018.3.6f1. Windows Executable.

Prequel: https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/real-man-pablo 

Prequel to the Prequel: https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/drain-swamp

Code and Level by: Daniel Bizup

Art by: Alex Ragland

Music by: Nick Ragland
